name: JAMSVGImage
summary: An easy way to parse and display resolution-independent SVG image graphics in iOS.
description: JAMSVGImage is used to parse and display SVG image graphics in iOS. SVG images are resolution independent so they look good at any size and don't require @2x or @3x versions. The JAMSVGImageView is IBDesignable and IBInspectable so you can see your SVGs in Interface Builder.
